name: email-tabs
description: Compose an email from your tabs
author: Mozilla Test Pilot Team (https://testpilot.firefox.com)

scripts.build:deps: mkdir -p addon/build/ && cp node_modules/react/umd/react.production.min.js node_modules/react-dom/umd/react-dom.production.min.js node_modules/react-dom/umd/react-dom-server.browser.production.min.js node_modules/readability/Readability.js node_modules/dompurify/dist/purify.min.js addon/build/ && babel --retain-lines addon/popup.jsx > addon/build/popup.js && babel --retain-lines addon/emailTemplates.jsx > addon/build/emailTemplates.js
scripts.build:ga: mkdir -p addon/build && cp node_modules/testpilot-ga/dist/index.js addon/build && mv addon/build/index.js addon/build/testpilot-ga.js
scripts.build:manifest: node -e 'let input = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync("package.json")); input.version = input.version.slice(0, -1) + Math.floor((Date.now() - new Date(new Date().getFullYear().toString()).getTime()) / 3600000); input.version_name = `${input.version} ${process.env.NODE_ENV === "prod" ? "release" : "dev"}`; console.log(JSON.stringify(input))' | mustache - addon/manifest.json.tmpl > addon/manifest.json
scripts.package: NODE_ENV=prod npm run build && cp web-ext-artifacts/`ls -t1 web-ext-artifacts | head -n 1` addon.xpi
scripts.run: mkdir -p ./Profile && npm run build:deps && web-ext run --source-dir=addon -p ./Profile --browser-console --keep-profile-changes -f "${FIREFOX:-nightly}"
